HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Welcome to Shelf Renamer! Please report any bugs you might find (or compliments you wish to give) on the mod's Steam Workshop page.

Shelf Renamer v1.0.0
- Fixed bug where pressing enter in the rename dialog wouldn't save. - Previous name now starts selected in rename dialog for easier replacement.
- Fixed a bug whereby ShelfRenamer would try to track data during WorldGen before it was properly initialised. Many thanks to XeoNovaDan for reporting this bug!
